however, a minimum of a 6-hour fast is', 'acceptable for participants with afternoon appointments.', 'c)', 'Glomerular filtration rate (GFR) will be estimated by the central laboratory using the Chronic Kidney Disease', 'Epidemiology Collaboration (CKD-EPl-creatinine) [Levey, 2009].
